hotels.vendor_name: Novotel Bali Nusa Dua - Hotel & Residences
hotels.title: Idyllic Novotel Bali Escape in the Heart of Nusa Dua with Lagoon Pool & Four Onsite Eateries
hotels.description: Experience one of the world’s favourite beach destinations with a stay at this sun-drenched paradise, set amid five hectares of lush gardens surrounding a sprawling two-tier lagoon pool. Close to a private beach club that's reachable by complimentary shuttle, this escape guarantees fun in the sun. Dine across four mouthwatering restaurants, including The Square - serving Balinese and international favourites - and fresh delights at Gourmet Bar, where drinks are served poolside. Little ones will adore the hotel's family-friendly facilities, including a fun-filled kids' club boasting a wealth of daily activities.

hotels.title: Bali Central Kuta Sanctuary with Onsite Restaurant & Bars, Oceanview Infinity Pool & Day Spa
hotels.description: Balinese bliss awaits at this sophisticated Kuta staqy. Perfectly position on Bali’s most beloved beach, Mercure Kuta is just moments from all the island’s best action, including fantastic food, aquatic activities and a thriving nightlife. Take a dip in the spectacular infinity pool, then retire to the onsite spa for a rejuvenating treatment. Watch a famous Bali sunset from ocean-facing Alang Alang Restaurant, savouring fragrant Asian and international dishes, then retire to your comfortable room for a restful evening in paradise.

hotels.title: Refined Bali Airport Haven with Outdoor Pool, Two Bars & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Be perfectly placed for exploration at this tropical hotel, conveniently located just steps from I Gusti Ngurah Rai International Airport. This serene oasis offers a refreshing retreat from the hustle of Kuta, with a glittering outdoor pool, modern fitness centre and onsite spa. Savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at the onsite restaurant, The Square, or sip on a refreshing drink at the Run@way Bar or GOURMETBAR. Venture beyond the hotel to discover the vibrant beach clubs of Seminyak or the majestic Uluwatu Temple, both within easy reach.

hotels.title: Secluded Bali Seaside Hideaway with Beach Access, Onsite Dining & Day Spa
hotels.description: Experience the tranquillity of Bali's east coast at this five-star Hyatt property, a serene sanctuary set between the sea and magnificent Mount Agung. Each suite and room boasts traditional Balinese design, with private terraces offering breathtaking ocean or garden views. Indulge in authentic Indonesian cuisine at Seasalt Restaurant, or enjoy a cocktail at the oceanfront bar. Then venture beyond the resort to discover the Tirta Gangga Water Palace, or explore the local market at Candidasa. Return to enjoy traditional massages and treatments to rejuvenate your mind, body and soul, or take a dip in the pool overlooking the sparkling sea.

hotels.title: Beachfront Legian Family-Friendly Paradise with 10 Restaurants and Bars, Outdoor Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Perfectly set on the golden sands of Legian Beach, this lively yet tranquil escape embraces the vibrant spirit of Bali. Spread across 10 acres of lush tropical gardens, this beachfront retreat blends authentic Balinese hospitality with a laid-back atmosphere in the heart of Legian - an ideal base for surfers, sunseekers and culture lovers alike. Spend days unwinding by sparkling pools or at Usadha Spa, then sample your way through the hotel's 10 diverse restaurants and bars. Step beyond the resort to discover bustling markets, renowned surf spots and a rich mix of local dining. For family-friendly fun, head to Waterbom Bali, or enjoy a shopping spree at the stylish Discovery Mall.
